name: Stitching Work Today
query:
WITH per_item AS (
  SELECT
    emp.employee_name AS employee,
    DATE(COALESCE(pp.posting_date, se.creation)) AS work_date,
    it.item_name,
    SUM(se.quantity) AS total_qty,
    SUM(COALESCE(se.amount, se.quantity * se.rate)) AS total_payable
  FROM `tabStitching Entry` se
  LEFT JOIN `tabProduction Plan` pp ON pp.name = se.parent
  LEFT JOIN `tabItem` it ON it.name = se.item_code
  LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` emp ON emp.name = se.employee
  WHERE se.parenttype = 'Production Plan'
    AND DATE(COALESCE(pp.posting_date, se.creation)) = CURDATE()
  GROUP BY emp.employee_name, DATE(COALESCE(pp.posting_date, se.creation)), it.item_name
),
all_rows AS (
  SELECT employee, work_date, item_name, total_qty, total_payable, 0 AS is_total
  FROM per_item
  UNION ALL
  SELECT employee, NULL AS work_date, 'TOTAL' AS item_name,
         SUM(total_qty), SUM(total_payable), 1 AS is_total
  FROM per_item
  GROUP BY employee
),
numbered AS (
  SELECT
    employee AS emp,
    work_date,
    item_name,
    total_qty,
    total_payable,
    is_total,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY employee ORDER BY is_total, work_date, item_name) AS rn
  FROM all_rows
)
SELECT
  CASE WHEN rn = 1 THEN emp ELSE '' END AS employee,
  work_date,
  item_name,
  total_qty,
  total_payable
FROM numbered
ORDER BY emp, is_total, work_date, item_name;

name: Cutting Section
query:
select
  i.item_name as "Cutting Item:Data:220",
  sum(sed.qty) as "Quantity:Float:120",
  i.description as "Item Description:Text:300"
from `tabStock Entry` se
join `tabStock Entry Detail` sed on sed.parent = se.name
join `tabItem` i on i.name = sed.item_code
left join `tabBOM` b on b.name = coalesce(se.bom_no, i.default_bom)
join `tabBOM Operation` bo on bo.parent = b.name
where
  se.docstatus = 1
  and se.purpose = 'Manufacture'
  and sed.is_finished_item = 1
  and se.posting_date = curdate()
  and bo.operation like 'Cutting%%'
group by i.name, i.item_name, i.description
order by i.item_name

name: Quilting Section
query:
SELECT
  i_fg.item_name AS "Items:Data:220",
  SUM(sed_fg.qty) AS "Quantity:Float:120",

  i_rm.item_name AS "Fiber:Data:180",
  SUM(
    IFNULL(sed_rm.transfer_qty, sed_rm.qty * IFNULL(sed_rm.conversion_factor, 1))
  ) AS "Weight:Float:120"
  -- If you want to show UOM too: , sed_rm.stock_uom AS "UOM:Data:80"

FROM `tabStock Entry` se

/* Finished goods from the Manufacture entry */
JOIN `tabStock Entry Detail` sed_fg
  ON sed_fg.parent = se.name AND sed_fg.is_finished_item = 1
JOIN `tabItem` i_fg
  ON i_fg.name = sed_fg.item_code

/* Raw-material rows from the same entry */
JOIN `tabStock Entry Detail` sed_rm
  ON sed_rm.parent = se.name AND IFNULL(sed_rm.is_finished_item, 0) = 0
JOIN `tabItem` i_rm
  ON i_rm.name = sed_rm.item_code
JOIN `tabItem Group` ig_rm
  ON ig_rm.name = i_rm.item_group

/* BOM + Operation (Quilt/Quilting) */
LEFT JOIN `tabBOM` b
  ON b.name = COALESCE(se.bom_no, i_fg.default_bom)
LEFT JOIN `tabBOM Operation` bo
  ON bo.parent = b.name

/* Fiber group root for nested-set membership (includes children) */
LEFT JOIN `tabItem Group` fiber_root
  ON fiber_root.name = 'Fiber'

WHERE
  se.docstatus = 1
  AND se.purpose = 'Manufacture'
  AND se.posting_date = CURDATE()
  AND bo.operation LIKE 'Quilt%%'
  /* keep only RM that belong to Fiber or its children */
  AND (
       ig_rm.name = 'Fiber'
       OR (fiber_root.name IS NOT NULL AND ig_rm.lft BETWEEN fiber_root.lft AND fiber_root.rgt)
      )

GROUP BY
  i_fg.item_name,
  i_rm.item_name
ORDER BY
  i_fg.item_name, i_rm.item_name;

name: Pillow Section
query:
SELECT
  i_fg.item_name AS "Items:Data:220",
  SUM(sed_fg.qty) AS "Quantity:Float:120",
  i_rm.item_name AS "Fiber:Data:180",
  SUM(
    IFNULL(sed_rm.transfer_qty, sed_rm.qty * IFNULL(sed_rm.conversion_factor, 1))
  ) AS "Weight:Float:120"
FROM `tabStock Entry` se

/* Finished goods */
JOIN `tabStock Entry Detail` sed_fg
  ON sed_fg.parent = se.name AND sed_fg.is_finished_item = 1
JOIN `tabItem` i_fg
  ON i_fg.name = sed_fg.item_code

/* Raw materials */
JOIN `tabStock Entry Detail` sed_rm
  ON sed_rm.parent = se.name AND IFNULL(sed_rm.is_finished_item, 0) = 0
JOIN `tabItem` i_rm
  ON i_rm.name = sed_rm.item_code
JOIN `tabItem Group` ig_rm
  ON ig_rm.name = i_rm.item_group

/* BOM + Operation */
LEFT JOIN `tabBOM` b
  ON b.name = COALESCE(se.bom_no, i_fg.default_bom)
LEFT JOIN `tabBOM Operation` bo
  ON bo.parent = b.name

/* Fiber group reference (nested set) */
LEFT JOIN `tabItem Group` fiber_root
  ON fiber_root.name = 'Fiber'

WHERE
  se.docstatus = 1
  AND se.purpose = 'Manufacture'
  AND se.posting_date = CURDATE()
  AND bo.operation LIKE 'Pillow%%'
  AND (
       ig_rm.name = 'Fiber'
       OR (fiber_root.name IS NOT NULL AND ig_rm.lft BETWEEN fiber_root.lft AND fiber_root.rgt)
      )

GROUP BY
  i_fg.item_name, i_rm.item_name
ORDER BY
  i_fg.item_name, i_rm.item_name;

name: Stitching With Date Filter
query:
WITH per_item AS (
  SELECT
    emp.employee_name AS employee,
    DATE(COALESCE(pp.posting_date, se.creation)) AS work_date,
    it.item_name,
    SUM(se.quantity) AS total_qty,
    SUM(COALESCE(se.amount, se.quantity * se.rate)) AS total_payable
  FROM `tabStitching Entry` se
  LEFT JOIN `tabProduction Plan` pp ON pp.name = se.parent
  LEFT JOIN `tabItem` it ON it.name = se.item_code
  LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` emp ON emp.name = se.employee
  WHERE se.parenttype = 'Production Plan'
    AND DATE(COALESCE(pp.posting_date, se.creation)) BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
  GROUP BY emp.employee_name, DATE(COALESCE(pp.posting_date, se.creation)), it.item_name
),
all_rows AS (
  SELECT employee, work_date, item_name, total_qty, total_payable, 0 AS is_total
  FROM per_item
  UNION ALL
  SELECT employee, NULL AS work_date, 'TOTAL' AS item_name,
         SUM(total_qty), SUM(total_payable), 1 AS is_total
  FROM per_item
  GROUP BY employee
),
numbered AS (
  SELECT
    employee AS emp,
    work_date,
    item_name,
    total_qty,
    total_payable,
    is_total,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY employee ORDER BY is_total, work_date, item_name) AS rn
  FROM all_rows
)
SELECT
  CASE WHEN rn = 1 THEN emp ELSE '' END AS employee,
  work_date,
  item_name,
  total_qty,
  total_payable
FROM numbered
ORDER BY emp, is_total, work_date, item_name;

name: Pending Report
query:
SELECT
    so.name AS "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:120",
    so.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
    so.transaction_date AS "Order Date:Date:100",
    so.workflow_state AS "Workflow State::150",
    so.owner AS "Owner::120"
FROM
    `tabSales Order` so
WHERE
    so.docstatus < 2
    AND so.workflow_state = 'Pending'
ORDER BY
    so.transaction_date DESC, so.name DESC;

name: Dispatch Report
query:
SELECT
    dn.name AS "Delivery Note:Link/Delivery Note:150",
    dn.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
    dni.item_name AS "Item Name::180",
    dni.qty AS "Quantity:Float:100",
    dni.uom AS "UOM:Link/UOM:80",
    dni.warehouse AS "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:150"
FROM
    `tabDelivery Note` dn
INNER JOIN
    `tabDelivery Note Item` dni ON dn.name = dni.parent
WHERE
    dn.docstatus = 1
    AND dn.posting_date = CURDATE()
ORDER BY
    dn.name, dni.item_code;

name: To Be Manufactured for Delivery
query:
SELECT
    soi.item_code AS "Item:Link/Item:120",
    SUM(soi.qty - soi.delivered_qty) AS "To Manufacture:Float:120"
FROM
    `tabSales Order Item` soi
JOIN
    `tabSales Order` so ON soi.parent = so.name
WHERE
    so.docstatus = 1
    AND so.status NOT IN ('Closed', 'Cancelled')
    AND (soi.qty - soi.delivered_qty) > 0
GROUP BY
    soi.item_code
ORDER BY
    soi.item_code;

name: Partial Dispatch Report
query:
SELECT
    so.name AS "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:150",
    so.transaction_date AS "Date:Date:100",
    so.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
    soi.item_code AS "Item:Link/Item:120",
    soi.qty AS "Ordered Qty:Float:100",
    soi.delivered_qty AS "Delivered Qty:Float:100",
    (soi.qty - soi.delivered_qty) AS "Pending Qty:Float:100",
    so.status AS "Order Status:Data:120"
FROM
    `tabSales Order Item` soi
JOIN
    `tabSales Order` so ON soi.parent = so.name
WHERE
    so.docstatus = 1
    AND so.status NOT IN ('Closed', 'Cancelled')
    AND soi.delivered_qty > 0
    AND soi.delivered_qty < soi.qty
ORDER BY
    so.transaction_date DESC, so.name;
